input.sentences: i went to the birthday party last week .
all of my friends were there .
we took a lot of pictures .
it was a ton of fun .
output.sentences: A family enjoys a young teenager's birthday at a restaurant.
After blowing out the candles, they all pose for a family pictures.
And the young boy wants an individual picture with his beloved family member.
Then the older adults take a picture together because they haven't seen each other in years.
After consuming all of the food, the family takes one last picture before going home.
